text: Va khi nhin chung, Nguoi (Muhammad) tram tro dang dap be ngoai cua chung; va khi chung noi, Nguoi lang nghe loi le cua chung. Chung giong nhu nhung khuc go (bong) dung e chong o. Chung nghi rang moii tieng thet eu nham chi trich chung. Chung la ke thu. Boi the, hay canh giac chung. Allah nguyen rua chung. Chung quay huong ve au
